Plot: Greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two mobster best friends and a trophy wife over a gambling empire.
Title: Casino
Writer: Nicholas Pileggi (book), Nicholas Pileggi (screenplay), Martin Scorsese (screenplay)
Actors: Robert De Niro, Sharon Stone, Joe Pesci, James Woods
tomatoConsensus: Impressive ambition and bravura performances from an outstanding cast help Casino pay off in spite of a familiar narrative that may strike some viewers as a safe bet for director Martin Scorsese.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 9 nominations.
